subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] ghost box hacks
author: Lisby
full_text:
Sum,

Before things go overboard here, Please clarify something: are these  
issues personal (as in someone is making threats against you) or have  
you been told by the manufacturer that there's a proprietary  
technology issue here? This is this business related, then we don't  
want to act against the advice of your legal council.

Ann


On Dec 1, 2007, at 7:37 PM, Sumra Dume wrote:

> Colleagues,
>
> Thank you for your concern.
> Events that unfolded early this morning have prompted me to
> effectively close the Ghostboxhacks site for the near term.
> Do to the nature of these events it is inappropriate to discuss the
> matter in a public form such as this.
>
> Please do not speculate on the nature of this event. I am sorry,
> after talking to council I removed my statement from Ghostboxhacks.
> I don't want to fuel wild speculation.
>
> I wish I could go in to greater detail, at this time I have been
> advised not to.
>
> Thank you, Everyone for your emails and concern.
>
> -Sum
>
>
>
